name: Spotify Premium Individual
description: Spotify Premium Individual offers an ad-free music experience with unlimited skips, offline downloads, and high-quality audio streaming. Enjoy millions of songs and podcasts without interruptions.

name: Spotify Premium Family
description: Spotify Premium Family allows up to 6 family members to enjoy ad-free music, personalized recommendations, and offline downloads under one subscription, while keeping individual accounts separate.

name: Spotify Premium Duo
description: Spotify Premium Duo is designed for two people living under the same roof. It includes Duo Mix, a playlist that updates based on both users' listening habits.

name: Spotify Premium Student
description: Spotify Premium Student offers all the benefits of Premium at a discounted price for eligible students. It includes ad-free listening, offline downloads, and access to exclusive deals.

name: Spotify Free
description: Spotify Free lets you stream millions of songs and podcasts with occasional ads. Enjoy shuffle play and discover new music, though with some limitations like offline playback.

name: Blinding Lights - The Weeknd
description: One of the most streamed songs of all time, 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd is a synth-driven, retro-inspired hit that captivates listeners worldwide.

name: Shape of You - Ed Sheeran
description: Ed Sheeran's 'Shape of You' is a record-breaking pop hit that has dominated charts globally. Its catchy melody and rhythmic beats make it a fan favorite.

name: Dance Monkey - Tones and I
description: 'Dance Monkey' by Tones and I is a viral sensation that took the world by storm, blending unique vocals with an infectious beat.

name: Someone Like You - Adele
description: Adele's heartfelt ballad 'Someone Like You' is a timeless classic that touches on love and heartbreak, showcasing her powerful vocal range.

name: Stay - The Kid LAROI, Justin Bieber
description: An energetic collaboration between The Kid LAROI and Justin Bieber, 'Stay' blends pop and electronic elements, making it a global hit.

name: Levitating - Dua Lipa
description: Dua Lipa's 'Levitating' is a disco-inspired anthem that keeps listeners dancing with its upbeat tempo and catchy chorus.

name: Industry Baby - Lil Nas X, Jack Harlow
description: Lil Nas X and Jack Harlow's 'Industry Baby' is a high-energy hip-hop track with bold lyrics and a powerful brass-heavy beat.

name: Heat Waves - Glass Animals
description: 'Heat Waves' by Glass Animals is an atmospheric indie hit that gained widespread popularity due to its dreamy soundscape and emotional depth.

name: good 4 u - Olivia Rodrigo
description: Olivia Rodrigo's 'good 4 u' combines pop-punk energy with raw emotions, making it an anthem of heartbreak and resilience.

name: As It Was - Harry Styles
description: Harry Styles' 'As It Was' is a synth-driven pop masterpiece that explores themes of change and nostalgia with a fresh and engaging sound.
